title: Inflation rate in Nicaragua 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1986 and 1987.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 13109.5 was reported at Year 1987
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 3.52 was reported at Year 2016

max_summary: The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1986 and 1987.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 13109.5 was reported at Year 1987
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 3.52 was reported at Year 2016

The line drastically increased by 4.0 times from Year 1984 to 1985,increased by 14.8 times from Year 1986 to 1987,decreased by 25.8 times from Year 1990 to 1991,decreased by 5.3 times from Year 1991 to 1992,decreased by 3.6 times from Year 1993 to 1994,increased by 3.0 times from Year 1994 to 1995,increased by 1.8 times from Year 2007 to 2008, and lastly, decreased by 5.4 times from Year 2008 to 2009.
